column1: ·, which are particularly efficient for digitizing Literary Sinitic texts, I will collate the existing published materials and synthesize them into a comprehensive dataset, forming the basis of foundational dataset for future digital processing. Second, after extracting time-series data from these digitized materials with a focus on date, type of natural disaster, and location, I will subsequently proceed to combine it with the China Historical Geographic Information System operated by Harvard University and Fudan University, which provides particularly time-series datasets for the Ming and Qing periods, to complete my own dataset.
